articles.title: Nokia 2.4 and Nokia 3.4 Phones to Launch in India on November 26: All You Need to Know - News18
articles.description: The Nokia 2.4 and Nokia 3.4 first debuted in September this year and are available to purchase in select countries. The Nokia 2.4 packs dual rear cameras while the Nokia 3.4 comes with triple rear cameras.
